column4: Is there a special way to use adesklets?  I select a desklet to download, and it seems like it freezes when it tries to download
if you have compiz i sincerely recommend using screenlets
I have "extra" screen effects... is that compiz?
where can I configure screenlets and get more?
well first of all be sure to have the compizconfig-settings-manager package installed
alright under system->preferences you should have "advanced desktop effects settings"
first of all you can configure how your desktop effects work there, but more importantly, under "desktop" there's the widget layer, you should enable it
all you need to do is install the screenlets package, and then run it from system->preferences->screenlets
it even has a little button for getting more screenlets, and there are some available on gnome-look.org as well
